wordGroup: arlington national cemetery 美国阿灵顿国家公墓

sentences.en: He was buried in Highgate Cemetery.
sentences.cn: 他被安葬在海格特墓地。

sentences.en: She rests beside her husband in the local cemetery.
sentences.cn: 在当地的墓地里，她长眠在她丈夫的墓旁。

sentences.en: Gunmen guarded homes near the cemetery with shotguns.
sentences.cn: 枪手携带猎枪守卫着公墓附近的住宅。
